content:
After the battle against the orcs, Luna became a hero among the faeries, dwarves, and dragons. She was celebrated for her bravery and her skill, and she was respected and admired by all who knew her.

But Luna was not content to rest on her laurels. She was a warrior at heart, and she longed for adventure and excitement. So, she decided to put her skills and her reputation to use, and she formed a mercenary company of faeries and dwarves.

Luna and her company of warriors traveled far and wide, offering their services to those who needed them. They battled against all manner of enemies, from fierce beasts and powerful monsters to skilled warriors and powerful mages. They were paid well for their services, and they became known as the best and most fearsome mercenaries in the land.

Luna and her company eventually set their sights on the human lands, which were rich and prosperous but also dangerous and unpredictable. They knew that they could earn a great deal of money and treasure if they were successful in their missions, and they were determined to succeed.

The humans, who had never seen a company of faeries and dwarves before, were both fascinated and intimidated by Luna and her warriors. They hired them to fight against their enemies and protect their lands, and they paid them well for their services.

Luna and her company proved to be fierce and skilled fighters, and they quickly gained a reputation among the humans as the best and most reliable mercenaries in the land. They were paid well for their services, and they used the money and treasure they earned to build a comfortable and prosperous life for themselves.

Luna and her company continued to adventure and fight for many years, earning a great deal of wealth and fame along the way. They became legends among the faeries, dwarves, and humans, and their names were remembered for generations to come.
